//: Provide url(s) in the urls list
update_mode is a bool and enables updating new chapters, rather than creating all chapters from scratch
verbose is a bool and provides info on execution.
ignore_errors is bool and allows program to continue, regardless of encountered issues
output_dir is used to designate an output folder. For program default, value should be null
rate_limit: A float deciding the time between scraping of each chapter in seconds
chapter_limit: Integer limiting the number of total scraped chapters per run (across all fictions and sites)
